definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 前邊|前边[qian2 bian5]

sentences.english: Look, Dashan. There's a service station straight ahead.
sentences.chinese: 大山，你看，前边有一家加油站。

sentences.english: Remove the front cover of the drawworks.
And that, his father and I sat by the side of his private Diaojiao house and chatted over tea.
sentences.chinese: 他阿爸拉我在自家的吊脚楼前边聊边喝茶。

sentences.english: The front drawworks guard should be put back in place when the operation is completed.
sentences.chinese: 作业结束之后，要尽快把绞车前边的护罩装回原处。

sentences.english: Cheng's wife put her money on the table, lit joss sticks and kowtowed just like others there.
sentences.chinese: 成名的妻子把钱放在案上，象前边的人一样烧香跪拜。

sentences.english: And the pines above and along and beside the sea.
sentences.chinese: 上面是松树林，前边与旁边是大海。

sentences.english: Remove the front guard cover of the drawworks.
I went through the town hall, I saw many people standing in front of the bulletin board.
sentences.chinese: 我走过镇公所的时候，看见许多人站在布告牌前边。

sentences.english: Install the front drawworks guard cover after the mast is raised.
sentences.chinese: 井架起来之后，把绞车前边的护罩装上。

sentences.english: You just stick a stamp on the postcard and put it in the mailbox over there.
sentences.chinese: 贴张邮花再扔到前边那个邮筒里就可以了。

sentences.english: Any special character preceded by an escape shall match itself.
sentences.chinese: 肆意特殊字符前边加转义符都般配本身。

sentences.english: At the front a blond woman is arguing with an attendant.
sentences.chinese: 排在前边的一个金发女士正在和一个服务员争执什么。

sentences.english: He forged into the lead just before the end of the race.
sentences.chinese: 在赛跑接近终点时，他突然加速前进，跑到最前边。

sentences.english: Please avoid parking in front of an open interment site unless you are part of a funeral procession.
sentences.chinese: 请避免将车停在前边的一处墓葬园，除非您是送葬。

sentences.english: The 2 oval plates on the right of the picture.
sentences.chinese: 汤盘是右边最前边那个奶壶下面那个圆形的。

sentences.english: The pillar of cloud also moved from in front and stood behind them
sentences.chinese: 云柱也从他们前边转到他们后边立住。

definition: left/the left side/to the left of
to open up a path/to make one's way through/to construct a road/(electricity) open circuit
(of children, parents etc) at one's side/living with one
the front (of)/(in) front/(in) sb's presence/just before (a date)
in front/in advance of the field
to lead the way/to guide/to show the way/fig. to instruct
